title: 'Yes I am petty, but you are also very impatient, lady': Infuriating driver makes it impossible for guy to back out of his parking spot, he gets even by making her park elsewhere
description: Impatient drivers are a hazard to everyone in their midst. This guy was getting into his car with his wife after their weekly trip to the grocery store when an impatient driver began honking at them because she wanted their parking space. Of course, this was pretty unnecessary, but the author and his wife just went about their routine. They finished putting their groceries in the trunk and got into their car at their own pace, while this lady was driving closer and closer to their car to make herself known. The author obviously had taken the hint at this point, but this woman couldn't help herself. It got to the point that by the time the author was backing out of his parking space, he could barely move because this woman's car was so close to his. It's as if she wanted to get into an accident. At that point, the author had had enough of this lady and decided to enact some well-deserved petty revenge…
author: Ben Weiss
